title: Battle of the Red Ring: Reclaiming the Imperial City - Elder Scrolls: Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
The Aldmeri Dominion invaded Cyrodiil and conquered the Imperial City.  Lord Naarifin, leader of the Aldmeri Dominion's army, assumed the Imperial Legion would surrender.  But they were wrong, a year after the city was conquered, the Imperial rallies an army to take it back!  Enjoy the Battle :D


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
